title: INtopBackup

items.title: Bald eagle officially declared US national bird after 250 years
items.description: The bird has been a national emblem in the US for years, but it never had an official status in the country's 248-year history.

items.title: 'The Bachelor,' Ukraine edition, features a veteran who lost both legs in the war
